snippet: The Paul Taylor Dance Company is to announce on Monday that it will commemorate the 25th anniversary of Mr. Taylor’s “Brandenburgs”and “Speaking in Tongues” by selling $5 tickets to the March 6 performance.
abstract: Paul Taylor Dance Company will commemorate 25th anniversary of Taylor's pieces Brandenburgs and Speaking in Tongues by selling $5 tickets to March 6 performance.
lead_paragraph: The Paul Taylor Dance Company is to announce on Monday that it will commemorate the 25th anniversary of Mr. Taylor’s “Brandenburgs”and “Speaking in Tongues” by selling $5 tickets to the March 6 performance.

headline.main: Taylor Dance Company Offers a Bargain
headline.print_headline: Taylor Dance Company Offers a Bargain
